alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 31 at 7:27PM CDT until June 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River AT Alvarado. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 108.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD STAGE. Overland flooding of local agricultural land. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 105.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 107.9 feet early Thursday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 106.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
